name: Outpost Kaloki (itch)
description:
Race against time to save the princess in this humorous space station tycoon game! Solve challenges, entertain visiting aliens, keep your ratings high, and rake in the money on your way to fame and glory.

Please download the DEMO (trial version) for free and see if you like it.  Outpost Kaloki is an older game (released in 2004), so it's a good idea to try the demo to make sure it runs nicely on your PC.

When you buy the game here on itch.io, you'll get access to download a License Key that unlocks the full game from the same demo you already have installed.  You'll also be able to download a full unlocked version (with no installer) if you prefer.

This is the Windows version of Outpost Kaloki.  For the Xbox 360 game, please visit the Microsoft store page for Outpost Kaloki X.

Changing Resolution/Windowed Mode

You can edit the settings.ini file inside the "fsall" folder where the project was installed.  You can change "FullScreen" to "no" to make the game run in a window.  And you can change the XScreenRes and YScreenRes values to something you prefer, e.g. 1920 by 1080
